ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] hi all
ygData.msgSnippet: Well yes i ussaly have to solo alot of the ppl here have moved on to dark age of camalot and when its out night time its about 4am in the usa so not many on.
ygData.messageBody:
Well yes i ussaly have to solo alot of the ppl here
have moved on to dark age of camalot and when its out
night time its about 4am in the usa so not many on.
For example i was in sky fire durning my eraly morning
and there where 35 ppl there .I then went in my later
afternoon and i was only person there till about
midnight my time.So soloing is what i have to do,dont
get me wrong there are some ppl on but alot of the
time they are into there own thing and dont want to
grp.I guess i just want a zone where a non twinked
necro can hunt semi safely.I was doing oot but now the
sea furries are light blue or green.
thanks all i need the help
Oh 1 more thing i got an email from some one selling a
help book for EQ telling me he has ways for me to make
1k per hour and how i can gain a level a day and so
forth...anyone got this book?is it worth it?
What secrets dose it hold?
thanks
jeffrey

--- Rob LeBeau <rlebeau65@...> wrote:

<HR>
<html><body>


<tt>
It sounds like you are trying to solo. I am no
expert<BR>
nor do I have a char that high but I have read in<BR>
numerous places that once you get high in level
you<BR>
need to group when hunting.  5 Level 54 people
should<BR>
do alright, I would imagine.<BR>
<BR>
Hope this helps<BR>
<BR>
--- perth6065 <perth6065@...>
wrote:<BR>
> Hi all im new here so thought id say a big
hello<BR>
> ....HELLO<BR>
> Im still new to Eq been playing about 7 months
now<BR>
> and its getting <BR>
> tough.Im now level 54 not twinked in the sligest
and<BR>
> got no place to <BR>
> hunt?<BR>
> Im not joking the places are too nasty or too
easy<BR>
> lolol<BR>
> I play a gnome necro on the drinal sever all
my<BR>
> guild are close <BR>
> freind and all aussies.Anyway if anone knows a
semi<BR>
> easy place to <BR>
> hunt let me know:) <BR>
> thanks<BR>
> <BR>

> <BR>
